message: Additional properties are not allowed ('@context' was unexpected) in /

instance.name: A multi-modal fitting approach to construct single-neuron models with patch-clamp and high-density microelectrode arrays
instance.citation: Buccino, Alessio Paolo; Damart, Tanguy; Bartram, Julian; Mandge, Darshan; Xue, Xiaohan; Zbili, Mickael; Gänswein, Tobias; Jaquier, Aurelien; Emmenegger, Vishalini; Markram, Henry; Hierlemann, Andreas; Van Geit, Werner (2023) A multi-modal fitting approach to construct single-neuron models with patch-clamp and high-density microelectrode arrays (Version draft) [Data set]. DANDI archive. https://dandiarchive.org/dandiset/000294/draft
instance.description:
This dataset contains simultaneous intracellular whole-cell patch clamp and extracellular high-density microelectrode array (HD-MEA) recordings.
It includes data from two files, corresponding to two recorded neurons. Each NWB file contains several runs of 8 eCode protocols, with syncronized intracellular voltages, stimulus currents, and extracellular voltages.

measurementTechnique.name: multi electrode extracellular electrophysiology recording technique

instance.acknowledgement: This study was supported by the ETH Zurich Postdoctoral Fellowship 19-2 FEL-17 (APB), the ERC Advanced Grant 694829 "neuroXscales" (JB, XX, TG, VE, AH), the China Scholarship Council (XX), and by funding to the Blue Brain Project, a research center of the École polytechnique fédérale de Lausanne (EPFL), from the Swiss government’s ETH Board of the Swiss Federal Institutes of Technology (TD, DM, MZ, AJ, HM, WVG).
